long_description: Step into the realm of fast-rolling 29 in. wheels with a lightweight frame that's designed for an excellent fit on the women's Cannondale Tango 29er 5 women's hardtail mountain bike. Women-specific design is optimized to let you experience the advantages of larger 29 in. wheels with a frame design that offers a low stand-over height. Light 6061 aluminum frame has double-butted tubes along with shaped chainstays and seatstays to improve comfort. SR Suntour XCM suspension fork delivers 80mm of travel with lockout adjustment. Adjust your gearing on the go with the dependable Shimano drivetrain, which uses Altus shifters and Acera derailleurs to snap through the 27 gears. Cannondale Helix 6 hydraulic disc brakes offer superb speed management, be it tiny finesses or big, outright stops. Sturdy Maddux rims are wrapped with WTB Nine Line tires for versatile trail traction. Specs on the Cannondale Tango 29er 5 women's hardtail mountain bike are subject to change.
short_description: Step into the realm of fast-rolling 29 in. wheels with a lightweight frame that's designed for an excellent fit on the women's Cannondale Tango 29er 5 women's hardtail mountain bike.
